pullrequest.title: [DON'T MERGE] Update launch files to call the correct spawner method

content.raw:
similarly, this does not crash but `charlie` will be spawned using the wrong spawner:  

```
ign launch -v 4 urban_circuit.ign worldName:=simple_urban_02 robotName1:=alpha robotConfig1:=X4_SENSOR_CONFIG_6 robotName2:=bravo robotConfig2:=X3_SENSOR_CONFIG_5 robotName3:=charlie robotConfig3:=X4_SENSOR_CONFIG_6
```

‌
content.html:
similarly, this does not crash but charlie will be spawned using the wrong spawner: 

ign launch -v 4 urban_circuit.ign worldName:=simple_urban_02 robotName1:=alpha robotConfig1:=X4_SENSOR_CONFIG_6 robotName2:=bravo robotConfig2:=X3_SENSOR_CONFIG_5 robotName3:=charlie robotConfig3:=X4_SENSOR_CONFIG_6

‌
